verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3128>Jonath-elem-rechokim,<s%> <S%H4387>Michtam<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H270>took<s%> him in <S%H1661>Gath.<s%> Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto me, O <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H582>man<s%> would swallow me <S%H7602>up;<s%> he <S%H3898>fighting<s%> <S%H3605>daily<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H3905>oppresseth<s%> me.

Mine <S%H8324>enemies<s%> would <S%H3605>daily<s%> <S%H3117><s%> swallow me <S%H7602>up:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they be <S%H7227>many<s%> that <S%H3898>fight<s%> against me, O thou most <S%H4791>High.<s%>

In <S%H430>God<s%> I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word,<s%> in <S%H430>God<s%> I have put my <S%H982>trust;<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> can <S%H6213>do<s%> unto me.
Every <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H6087>wrest<s%> my <S%H1697>words:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are <S%H5921>against<s%> me for <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

They gather themselves <S%H1481>together,<s%> they <S%H6845>hide<s%> themselves, <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H8104>mark<s%> my <S%H6119>steps,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> they wait <S%H6960>for<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
Shall <S%H3926>they<s%> <S%H6403>escape<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H205>iniquity?<s%> in thine <S%H639>anger<s%> cast <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> O <S%H430>God.<s%>
Thou <S%H5608>tellest<s%> my <S%H5112>wanderings:<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> my <S%H1832>tears<s%> into thy <S%H4997>bottle:<s%> are they <S%H3808>not<s%> in thy <S%H5612>book?<s%>

When <S%H3117><s%> I <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto thee, <S%H227>then<s%> shall mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H268>back:<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> I <S%H3045>know;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is for me.
In <S%H430>God<s%> will I <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word:<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will I <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word.<s%>
In <S%H430>God<s%> have I put my <S%H982>trust:<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> can <S%H6213>do<s%> unto me.
Thy <S%H5088>vows<s%> are <S%H5921>upon<s%> me, O <S%H430>God:<s%> I will <S%H7999>render<s%> <S%H8426>praises<s%> unto thee.

For <S%H3588><s%> thou hast <S%H5337>delivered<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4480>death:<s%> <S%H4194><s%> wilt <S%H3808>not<s%> thou deliver my <S%H7272>feet<s%> from <S%H4480>falling,<s%> <S%H1762><s%> that I may <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
